General.Name: Root Inc
General.Description: Root, Inc. provides insurance products and services in the United States. The company offers automobile and renters insurance products. It operates a direct-to-consumer model; and serves customers primarily through mobile applications and its website. The company's direct distribution channels also cover digital media, independent agents, and referrals, as well as distribution partners. Root, Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio.
General.Address: 80 E. Rich Street, Columbus, OH, United States, 43215
